item.title: Elettrica 电动车的推出标志着法拉利力争到 2030 年实现 20% 的电动车阵容
item.description: 法拉利豪华跑车制造商周四表示，未来几年，法拉利将继续把汽油和混合动力车型作为其产品系列的核心，到2030年，全电动汽车（EV）将只占其产品系列的20%。【原文：Ferrari will keep petrol and hybrid models at the heart of its lineup in coming years, with fully electric vehicles (EVs) making up just 20% of its range by 2030, the luxury sportscar maker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度推出通过 ChatGPT 进行电子商务支付的试点项目
item.description: 印度支付管理机构印度国家支付公司和金融科技公司 Razorpay 周四表示，已与微软支持的 OpenAI 合作，在 ChatGPT 上推出人工智能驱动的支付。【原文：India's payments authority National Payments Corporation of India and fintech firm Razorpay have collaborated with Microsoft-backed OpenAI to launch AI-driven payments on ChatGPT, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 受恒生收购行动影响，汇丰股价从高位下滑 6
item.description: 英国汇丰银行宣布计划收购其控股子公司恒生银行的少数股权，交易价值约为 136 亿美元，此后汇丰股价在伦敦下跌 6%，跌幅接近历史最高水平。【原文：HSBC shares fell 6% in London from near record levels after the British bank announced plans to buy out minorities in its majority-held Hang Seng Bank subsidiary in a deal worth around $13.6 billion.】

item.title: 保时捷全球销量连续 9 个月下滑，中国市场跌幅最大
item.description: 德国豪华跑车制造商保时捷周四表示，2025 年前九个月该公司在全球范围内的销量出现下滑，中国市场下滑 26% 的原因被归咎于严峻的市场环境和激烈的竞争。【原文：Germany luxury sports carmaker Porsche said on Thursday its sales fell globally in the first nine months of 2025, blaming challenging market conditions and intense competition for a 26% slump in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 高市对日本央行独立性的嘲讽可能面临政治现实的检验
item.description: 日本下一任首相可能会重申政府对央行的控制权，这加剧了人们对政治干预货币政策的担忧，但日元疲软和政治因素可能会限制这种推动。【原文：A pledge by Japan's next likely prime minister to reassert government sway over the central bank has fanned worries about political interference in monetary policy, however, a weak yen and politics could limit any such push.】

item.title: 据英国广播公司报道，摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙警告美国股市存在调整风险
item.description: 据英国广播公司（BBC）报道，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）警告说，在未来六个月至两年内，美国股市大幅回调的风险加大。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon warned of a heightened risk of a significant correction in the U.S. stock market within the next six months to two years, the BBC reported.】

item.title: 优衣库运营商 Fast Retailing 全年利润大增 13%，超出预期
item.description: 全球服装品牌优衣库（Uniqlo）的所有者日本快速零售公司（Fast Retailing）周四抵御住了美国关税带来的不利影响，连续第四年实现创纪录的利润。【原文：Japan's Fast Retailing , owner of global clothing brand Uniqlo, booked its fourth consecutive year of record profit on Thursday, as it withstood headwinds from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展，台积电第三季度营收大幅增长，超出预期
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周四公布第三季度营收同比增长 30%，高于市场预期，原因是市场对人工智能应用的兴趣激增，导致对该公司产品的需求飙升。【原文：TSMC, the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Thursday third-quarter revenue rose 30% year-on-year, beating the market forecast, as demand for the company's products leapt on surging interest in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 分析师称，日本银行完全有能力加入日经指数高市兴奋的行列
item.description: 本周推动日本股市屡创新高的 "高市交易 "与银行业擦肩而过，银行业的表现严重落后于市场，因为投资者担心佐佐江-高市将成为日本新的领导人，因此对其风险敞口进行了重新定价。【原文：The "Takaichi trade" that propelled Japanese stocks to record highs this week passed by the banking sector, which heavily underperformed the market as investors, bracing for Sanae Takaichi as the nation's new leader, repriced their exposure.】

item.title: 华尔街牛市接近三年，历史表明它可能仍有生命力
item.description: 美国股市的牛市行情已经持续了近三年，但如果以史为鉴，这只能算是中年行情。【原文：The U.S. stock market's bull run is almost three years old, but if history is a guide, that would make it only middle-aged.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国批准英伟达部分阿联酋销售订单
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，美国已批准向阿联酋出口价值数十亿美元的 Nvidia 芯片。【原文：The United States has approved several billion dollars worth of Nvidia chip exports to the United Arab Emirates, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 避险需求助推黄金创纪录上涨，黄金稍事喘息
item.description: 由于经济和地缘政治的不确定性以及对美国今年进一步降息的希望，金银有史以来首次突破了每盎司4000美元的关键价位。【原文：Gold took a breather from a record run on Thursday, as investors booked profits a day after bullion breached the key $4,000-per-ounce level for the first time ever on economic and geopolitical uncertainties and hopes of further U.S. rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华纳音乐正与 Netflix 洽谈以旗下艺人为原型制作电影的事宜
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，华纳音乐公司（Warner Music）即将与 Netflix 达成协议，根据该公司旗下艺人和歌曲制作各种电影和纪录片。【原文：Warner Music is nearing an agreement with Netflix to create a variety of movies and documentaries based on the label's artists and songs, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴与 NBA 签订多年人工智能和云计算合作协议
item.description: 中国电子商务公司阿里巴巴集团周四宣布与美国国家篮球协会（NBA）建立多年合作关系，为其提供人工智能和云计算服务。【原文：Chinese e-commerce company Alibaba Group announced on Thursday a multi-year partnership with the National Basketball Association to provide artificial intelligence and cloud computing services.】

item.title: 高市政策顾问称日元疲软对经济有利
item.description: 为日本可能的新首相佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）的政策圈提供咨询的经济学家相田拓次（Takuji Aida）说，日元目前的疲软有利于经济，积极的财政支出可以抵消进口成本上涨对家庭造成的打击。【原文：The yen's current weakness benefits the economy and the hit to households from rising import costs can be offset by aggressive fiscal spending, said Takuji Aida, an economist advising the policy circle of Japan's likely new premier Sanae Takaichi.】

item.title: 亚洲股市被人工智能的兴奋情绪所席卷，石油因加沙停火协议而下滑
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市重拾升势，投资者对所有与人工智能相关的事物都倍加青睐，而黄金则守在 4000 美元上方，美元也保持了近期的大幅涨势。【原文：Asian stock markets resumed their ascent on Thursday as investors doubled down on all things AI-related, while gold held atop $4,000 and the dollar retained its recent hefty gains.】

item.title: 日元走强，美元将创一年来最佳一周汇率
item.description: 美元周四持稳，有望创下近一年来最好的一周汇率，这主要是受到日元疲软的提振，日元因日本执政党换届而陷入困境。【原文：The dollar held steady on Thursday, on track for its best week in nearly a year, buoyed by a weak yen that has struggled on the back of a change of guard in Japan's ruling party.】

item.title: 中国收紧稀土出口管制，瞄准国防和半导体用户
item.description: 中国周四加强了稀土出口管制，扩大了对加工技术和未经授权的海外合作的限制，并明确表示要限制向海外国防和半导体用户的出口。【原文：China tightened its rare earth export controls on Thursday, expanding restrictions on processing technology, unauthorised overseas cooperation and spelling out its intention to limit exports to overseas defence and semiconductor users.】

item.title: 澳新银行任命三位新高管，加强零售、风险和技术部门
item.description: 澳大利亚贷款机构澳新银行周四宣布了集团执行委员会的三项高级领导任命，以加强其零售、风险管理和技术运营。【原文：Australian lender ANZ on Thursday announced three senior leadership appointments to its Group Executive Committee as part of efforts to strengthen its retail, risk management and technology operations.】

item.title: 石油因加沙计划和中东风险溢价消退而下跌
item.description: 以色列和哈马斯就结束加沙战争的第一阶段计划达成一致后，油价在周四的早盘交易中下跌，拖累了石油的战争风险溢价，并推动投资者抛售。【原文：Oil prices fell in early trade on Thursday after Israel and Hamas agreed to the first phase of a plan to end the war in Gaza, weighing on oil's war risk premium and pushing investors to sell.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，随着对 OpenAI 依赖度的降低，微软与哈佛大学合作开发 Copilot 健康查询系统
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，微软正在与哈佛大学医学院合作，通过健康内容增强其 Copilot 人工智能助手的功能，这也是微软为减少对 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 的依赖而做出的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Microsoft is partnering with Harvard Medical School to enhance its Copilot AI assistant with health content, as part of a broader effort to reduce its dependence on ChatGPT-maker OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 狮城资源公司修改与福特汽车公司的贷款和供应协议；股价上涨
item.description: 狮城资源公司（Liontown Resources）周四表示，该公司修订了与福特汽车公司签订的贷款和锂矿供应协议，旨在加强近期流动性，并在西澳大利亚凯瑟琳谷锂矿项目增产时获得更大的营销灵活性。【原文：Liontown Resources said on Thursday it amended its loan and spodumene supply agreements with Ford Motor , aiming to bolster near-term liquidity and gain more flexibility in marketing output as production ramps up at its Kathleen Valley lithium project in Western Australia.】

item.title: 谷歌将为 LA28 提供云基础设施和人工智能工具
item.description: 主办方周三表示，谷歌将成为 2028 年洛杉矶奥运会和残奥会的官方云服务提供商，并已加入 LA28 成为创始合作伙伴。【原文：Google will serve as the official cloud provider of the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic and Paralympic Games and has joined LA28 as a founding partner, organisers said on Wednesday, in a deal that also extends to Team USA and NBCUniversal's U.S. coverage.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所双子星成立澳大利亚分支机构
item.description: 加密货币交易所双子星公司（Gemini）周四表示，该公司已在澳大利亚开展业务，提供数字货币兑换服务以满足日益增长的需求。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Gemini said on Thursday it has launched an Australian operation as the firm expands into the country, offering its digital currency exchange services to tap into growing demand.】

item.title: 法官驳回零售集团对纽约监控定价法的质疑
item.description: 一名联邦法官周三驳回了美国全国零售联合会（National Retail Federation）对纽约州一项法律合宪性提出的质疑，该法律要求零售商在使用顾客的个人数据制定价格（即监控定价）时必须告知顾客。【原文：A federal judge on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit by the National Retail Federation challenging the constitutionality of a New York state law requiring retailers to tell customers when their personal data are used to set prices, known as surveillance pricing.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国证券交易委员会就会计实务问题对大众互惠进行调查
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，美国监管机构正在对马萨诸塞州相互人寿保险公司投资业务的会计做法进行调查。【原文：U.S. regulators are investigating Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance over its accounting practices in investment operations, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国首相斯塔默将在莫迪会晤中称赞贸易和科技关系
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）和印度首相纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）将于周四庆祝两国不断深化的商业关系，宣布印度将进一步投资英国，并举行两人之间的会晤。【原文：British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and his Indian counterpart Narendra Modi will celebrate their countries' deepening commercial ties on Thursday with an announcement of further Indian investment into the UK and a meeting between the two.】

item.title: Alliance Laundry 在美国首次公开募股中融资 8.26 亿美元
item.description: 商业洗衣设备制造商 Alliance Laundry 周三表示，其扩大后的纽约首次公开募股定价为市场区间的上限，共募集资金 8.263 亿美元，为美国政府停摆期间持续的首次公开募股活动再添一笔。【原文：Alliance Laundry priced its upsized New York initial public offering at the top end of its marketed range, raising $826.3 million, the commercial laundry equipment maker said on Wednesday, adding to continued IPO activity amid a U.S. government shutdown.】

item.title: 蒙大拿州煤炭拍卖令人失望，美国推迟怀俄明州煤炭租赁销售
item.description: 内政部发言人周三表示，在蒙大拿州令人失望的拍卖两天后，特朗普政府推迟了原定在怀俄明州联邦土地上出售煤炭租约的计划。【原文：The Trump administration has postponed a scheduled sale of coal leases on federal lands in Wyoming two days after a disappointing auction in Montana, an Interior Department spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易日：重新发现兴奋点
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets.】
